room_title: Escape room "Once Upon A Time: The Enchanted Escape" by Escape Game Knoxville in Knoxville
review: Five of us did the Once Upon a Time room. 2 were children ages 8 & 10.. Everyone had a lot of fun. Used some clues and the kids were able to help solve some of the riddles making for a great time. Sadly though, we did not escape.

room_title: Escape room "Once Upon A Time: The Enchanted Escape" by Escape Game Knoxville in Knoxville
review: If your a fan of escape room games you will want to go here. They design their own and each has very creative parts to solving the overall games. Helpful and friendly staff. They often run specials. Look for discount codes that are usually on their Facebook page.

room_title: Escape room "Once Upon A Time: The Enchanted Escape" by Escape Game Knoxville in Knoxville
review: Visited Escape Game Knoxville for my son's birthday and we escaped The Once Upon A Time room. The owner gave us a birthday discount for my son so he got in for free. We had a great time and do plan on going back to try the other rooms.
